title: Светлая ночь
author: Lugovenko Nicholas
description:
Nikolai Lugovenko is one of the most outstanding landscape painters of the 21st century. His classic landscapes are done with oil on canvas. 'Bright Night' is related to realism being a representative of landscapes genre. A distinctive feature of the painter's writing style is the longing to achieve the utmost realism in every detail. His canvases amaze with their sincerity, reverent love for the world around and motherland. 

This painting has a Guiness certificate for being exhibited in more than 10000 meters of height.
